des:
Hogar system is capable of all levels of control and automation. It is modular and can be scaled to automate any size real estate. Can be retrofit into an existing house, villa and or an apartment. Completely wireless so it is easy to upgrade. Most advanced features like Lighting control, Security, Comfort & Convenience, Energy Efficiency, and Entertainment control are readily addressed.

Use the Alexa device or Alexa App to control your lights, blinds/shutters, cameras, thermostats, sensors, scenes and even more.

To use Hogar skill you need:
✰ A Hogar Smart hub
✰ Hogar Smart controls
✰ Access to a wireless network
✰ Source of electric power
✰ You must download the Hogar app to your IPhone (from iOS 9) or Android smartphone (from Android 5) and complete the initial set up process

With this skill you can:
✰ control your entire home smart devices and electrical applainces
✰ Use the full range of Alexa's Smart Home commands to control your Hogar system
✰ easily monitor, control and secure your home from anywhere


Command for controlling switches,

Alexa, Turn on/off <Room Name> <Device Name>

Command for controlling Dimmer(Light Dimmer and Fan Dimmer),

Alexa, Turn on/off <Room Name> <Device Name>
Alexa, Set % on <Room Name> <Device Name>

Command for Activating Scenes,

Alexa, Activate <Scene Name>
